dcterms:creator: Y. Xue
X. Liao
L. Carin
B. Krishnapuram
dcterms:description: This dataset includes 29 landmine fields. For each field, every entry in the dataset consists of 9 features and a binary label indicating whether the corresponding location contains landmines.
dcterms:title: Landmine Detection Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. A. Rahman
C. Merck
Y. Huang
S. Kleinberg
dcterms:description: This dataset contains sensor measurements from Google glasses worn by 38 participants. Every agent attempts to use 57 features to predict whether the participant is eating or performing other activities.
dcterms:title: Activity Recognition Using Google Glasses Dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Anguita
A. Ghio
L. Oneto
X. Parra
J. L. Reyes-Ortiz
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of mobile phone sensor measurements from 30 subjects performing 6 activities. Each agent attempts to tune the hyperparameters of a subject's activity prediction model.
dcterms:title: Activity Recognition Using Mobile Phone Sensors Dataset
